text:
If you have a passion for design and experience in HTML, this may be of Interest to you!

At Travis Perkins in Northampton (UK), there is currently an excellent opportunity for an ambitious individual looking to get their foot on the IT ladder.

If you are interested email me at fleur.shakespeare@travisperkins.co.uk or click on the following link:
